title: Land on one of the most challenging airports in the world!

Situated 35 kilometres (22 mi) north of Pasto, the airport accommodates domestic flights, military operations, and private charters. Recent upgrades include a new terminal, administrative buildings, and a control tower, along with advanced navigation equipment to support the growing volume of passenger and cargo traffic.
